name: Immortal Cultivation Heroes (Enhanced Mortal Chapter)
description: Add a castle hero Han Li, an elemental city hero Nangong Wan, a hell hero Ziling, a necropolis hero Yuan Yao, and a rampart hero Jiuxiao. Strengthen Han Li and Nangong Wan. This MOD is for pure entertainment and extremely unbalanced. Advanced players should use it with caution.
author: L

1.0.0: Add a castle hero Han Li, an elemental city hero Nangong Wan, a hell hero Ziling, a necropolis hero Yuan Yao, and a rampart hero Jiuxiao. Strengthen Han Li and Nangong Wan.
1.0.1: Modified Han Li, Nan Gong Wan and their commanders.

chinese.name: 修仙英雄（凡人篇加强版）
chinese.description: 添加一个城堡英雄韩立，一个元素城英雄南宫婉，一个地狱英雄紫灵，一个亡灵城元瑶，一个壁垒英雄九霄，加强韩立、南宫婉，此MOD是纯娱乐，极度不平衡，高玩慎用。
